MACRO-VERIFIED 25G PROTEIN

MINT CHOCOLATE PROTEIN PUDDING
(MACRO-VERIFIED)

Protein

25G

Calories

210

Prep Time

5M

Bake Time

20M

Yield

2

A refreshing and decadent mint chocolate protein pudding with 25g of protein. Tastes like a thin mint cookie! All nutrition data is verified using USDA FoodData Central for accuracy.

JUMP TO RECIPE

INGREDIENTS

  • chocolate whey protein powder 60g
  • plain Greek yogurt 240g
  • 60ml unsweetened almond milk 0g
  • 1/4 tsp peppermint extract 0g
  • stevia or other sweetener to taste 5g

NUTRITION PER PUDDING

25g

Protein

210

Calories

15g

Carbs

6g

Fat

INSTRUCTIONS

1

In a bowl, whisk together the protein powder, Greek yogurt, almond milk, peppermint extract, and sweetener.

2

Continue whisking until the mixture is completely smooth and no lumps remain.

3

Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the pudding to set.

4

Divide the pudding into two servings.

5

Top with a sprinkle of chocolate chips or a fresh mint leaf.
